title: Keep Cool this Summer with AM09 Hot + Cool – Dyson Official Video
description: The only fan heater with Jet Focus control. Focused mode for long-range powerful airflow, or diffused mode for wide projection. The Dyson Hot + Cool™ fan heater heats rooms quickly and evenly. And in warmer weather, it cools you effectively.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
The only fan heater with Jet Focus control. Focused mode for long-range powerful airflow, or diffused mode for wide projection. The Dyson Hot + Cool™ fan heater heats rooms quickly and evenly. And in warmer weather, it cools you effectively.

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus

transcripts: The Dyson hot and cool fan heater. Uses air multiplier technology. To cool you in summer, and warm you in winter. Now with jet focus technology for personal or whole room projection.
